title: Winter Clothing Drive
description: Donate your unused warm clothes to help children and families stay warm during the cold season.

title: Food Relief Program
description: Providing daily food packages for homeless people and families struggling with hunger.

title: School Supplies Donation
description: Help underprivileged children get notebooks, pens, and school bags to continue their education.

title: Medical Aid Camp
description: Offering free health check-ups, medicines, and awareness sessions for rural communities.

title: Flood Relief Campaign
description: Supporting families affected by floods with food, clean water, and temporary shelters.

title: Orphanage Support
description: Providing clothes, books, and toys to children living in orphanages across the country.
